Fig1: Cryptographic algorithms
===============================

.. raw:: html

    <div class="clt">
    <ul>
       Cryptographic algorithms
            <ul>
                 <li> Symmetric encryption
                      <ul>
                          <li> Block cipher
                              <ul>
                                  <li> AES </li>
                                  <li> DES </li>
                                  <li> Twofish </li>
                                  <li> Blowfish </li>
                              </ul>
                          </li>

                          <li> Stream cipher
                              <ul>
                                  <li> RC4 </li>
                                  <li> ChaCha </li>
                              </ul>
                          </li>
                     </ul>
                </li>

                <li> Asymmetric encryption
                    <ul>
                        <li> RSA </li>
                        <li> ECC </li>
                    </ul>
                </li>

                <li> Hashing functions
                    <ul>
                        <li> RSA </li>
                        <li> ECC </li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
            </ul>
    </ul>
